vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καπνο-δόκη, ἡ,
properly smoke-receiver, i.e. hole in the roof for the smoke to pass through, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—later καπνο-δόχη [LXX+2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: hole in the roof for the smoke to pass through
vocabInfos.mediumDef: hole in the roof for the smoke to pass through
vocabInfos.stepGloss: hole in the roof for the smoke to pass through
